We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. the entire ordeal, Michael Vick agreed to a two-year deal with Unequal Technologies, a company that produces protective padding for athletes. Michael Vick struggled at times this season with an injured rib and back. Part of the reason I'm here is because I was able to wear some rib protection this season to guide me through my injury, Michael Vick said. "Unequal was one of the reasons I've been able to make it through the season." Michael Vick will get the start on Sunday and try to earn his first Pro Bowl victory

. Zahi Hawass wrote, in a post to his Web site, which, due to the blocked Internet access at the time, he had to fax to colleagues in Italy to upload: My heart is broken and my blood is boiling. I feel that everything I have done in the last nine years has been destroyed in one day, but all the inspectors, young archaeologists, and administrators, are calling me from sites and museums all over Egypt to tell me that they will give their life to protect our antiquities.
